attributes.action: reverse the decision to charge rates for empty properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charging full rates on empty properties from April 1 2008 is hugely onerous as by definition, empty properties do not attract income!  The three or six month exemption periods are too short to encourage tenants, especially in the current economic climate.  The timing of this tax could not therefore be worse.  Properties that have already been vacant for the three or six months at 1 April 2008 will immediately attract the full rate, as the tax is retrospective.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
